zh_CN.DialogText: 或许在十年前不曾有人想到，自己要在满屋天日的放射性火山灰和城市废墟里求生。

en_US.DialogText: Perhaps a decade ago, no one thought that they would survive in a house full of radioactive volcanic ash and urban ruins.

zh_CN.DialogText: 但我就是这么一个幸运儿，或者说一个倒霉蛋，得以体验过去70亿人不曾体验过的末日

en_US.DialogText: But I am such a lucky person, or unlucky person, to experience the doomsday that 7 billion people have not experienced in the past

zh_CN.DialogText: 在火山灰和放射尘的覆盖下...今天也是阴沉的一天呢

en_US.DialogText: Under the cover of volcanic ash and radioactive dust,Today is also a gloomy day

zh_CN.DialogText: 但是生活依然要继续，虽然谁也不知道我们能撑到什么时候

en_US.DialogText: But life still has to go on, although no one knows when we can last

zh_CN.DialogText: 维持着我的思考到现在的，可能只剩下生物的求生本能了

en_US.DialogText: Maintaining my thinking until now, there may be only biological survival instinct left

zh_CN.DialogText: 就这样胡思乱想着，今天的生活和探索也要继续。

en_US.DialogText: In this way, the life and exploration of today should continue.
